name: kitten
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool placekitten.
Tool description: A quick and simple service for getting pictures of kittens for use as placeholders in your designs or code. Just put your image size (width & height) after our URL and you'll get a placeholder.
API description: Fetches a kitten image of specified width and height using the Placekitten API.

width.description: The width of the kitten image.

height.description: The height of the kitten image.
